Growth Hacking

Learn how to build sustainable user growth.

  1. What The FSCK is Growth Hacking?
  2. The Three Magic Questions

If you don't want to come back to check for new releases just subscribe below for email notifications. Don't worry your not signing up for spam, just links to upcoming articles.

There's a lot of discussion about growth hacking in the technosphere right now. Startups are falling over themselves to hire these masters of user growth. Hell, that's how I got hired at my current role at mashape and it's also why your here reading this. Every week I'll add a new article with the aim to help you grow your own website, product, or API's userbase.

In this weekly series you will learn:

  • How to grow your sustainably increase user growth
  • How to optimize your landing pages and funnels
  • How to write effective copy and emails
  • How to read analytics to give you the insight you need to take action
  • How to create A|B tests and measure the results
  • How to make your users happy to give you their contact information
  • How to get your fans to become advocates of your brand
  • and a whole lot more...

Ready? Set, Go! What The FSCK is Growth Hacking?
